name: Glass Smashing
description:
Key Highlights:

* It’s FREE

* Available in 2 stores: ‘App Store’ and ‘Google Play’

* In 3 languages: English, French and ‘Latin American Spanish’

* On 3 portable devices: Mobile, tab and iPod Touch

How to Play: Keep breaking all the colourful glasses (except red ones). Glasses, if left unbroken, hit the bottom bar and destroy themselves. If you leave any non-red glass or break any red glass, you will lose one life. Game is over if you lose all the lives, however, you may resume the game by watching an advertisement (only 2 advertisements will be loaded per game). Challenge yourself to set up new high-score every time you play a new game.
